You are hereAdmissions Home › Experience SSU ›  
Virtual Application Advising Appointments







 
Have questions about SSU admissions requirements?  Want to apply, but need some assistance with your application?  Or maybe you just want to learn more about SSU?  Schedule a one-on-one appointment with an Outreach and Recruitment Counselor.   They are here to assist you and answer any questions you may have about attending SSU. 
Appointments are available in 15-minute blocks from 8:30 AM to 10:30 AM (PST) and from 3:00 PM to 4:00 PM (PST) on Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursdays. 20-minute appointments are also available from 6:00 PM to 7:00 PM (PST) on Tuesdays.
Register Now!
